item.title: Zja add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "The future remains uncertain and so it should, for it is the canvas upon which we paint our desires. Thus always the human condition faces a beautifully empty canvas. We possess only this moment in which to dedicate ourselves continuously to the sacred presence which we share and create." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Zja add a quote by Serj Tankian
item.description: "I really feel like civilisation's already over. It's not ending but it's already done. We're all addicted to the concept that humanity equals civilisation and that's not the case. We need a global conversation to be able to decipher how we can live from this point forward. We have to redefine our relationship with our environment." -- Serj Tankian

item.title: Zja add a quote by David Gemmell
item.description: "If there is one sound the follows the march of humanity, it is the scream." -- David Gemmell

item.title: Zja add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Zja add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "The people I distrust most are those who want to improve our lives but have only one course of action." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Zja add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Zja add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I declare after all there is no enjoyment like reading! How much sooner one tires of any thing than of a book! -- When I have a house of my own, I shall be miserable if I have not an excellent library." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Zja add a quote by Joseph Conrad
item.description: "The belief in a supernatural source of evil is not necessary; men alone are quite capable of every wickedness." -- Joseph Conrad

item.title: Zja add a quote by Christopher Morley
item.description: "Read, every day, something no one else is reading. Think, every day, something no one else is thinking. Do, every day, something no one else would be silly enough to do. It is bad for the mind to be always part of unanimity." -- Christopher Morley

item.title: Zja add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "Believe those who are seeking the truth. Doubt those who find it." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Zja add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The end of the human race will be that it will eventually die of civilization." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Zja add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Zja add a quote by Michael I. Rostovtzeff
item.description: "For me archaeology is not a source of illustrations for written texts, but an independent source of historical information, with no less value and importance, sometimes more importance, that the written sources." -- Michael I. Rostovtzeff

item.title: Zja add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Zja add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Some say the world will end in fire, Some say in ice. From what I've tasted of desire, I hold with those who favor fire. But if it had to perish twice I think I know enough of hate To say that for destruction ice Is also great And would suffice." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Zja add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "We dance round in a ring and suppose, But the Secret sits in the middle and knows." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Zja add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "To see a World in a Grain of Sand And a Heaven in a Wild Flower, Hold Infinity in the palm of your hand And Eternity in an hour." -- William Blake

item.title: Zja add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "The tree which moves some to tears of joy is in the eyes of others only a green thing that stands in the way. Some see nature all ridicule and deformity... and some scarce see nature at all. But to the eyes of the man of imagination, nature is imagination itself." -- William Blake

item.title: Zja add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "A man can't soar too high, when he flies with his own wings." -- William Blake

item.title: Zja add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "If the doors of perception were cleansed every thing would appear to man as it is, Infinite. For man has closed himself up, till he sees all things thro' narrow chinks of his cavern." -- William Blake

item.title: Zja add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "He who binds to himself a joy Does the winged life destroy; But he who kisses the joy as it flies Lives in eternity's sun rise." -- William Blake

item.title: Zja add a quote by Percy Bysshe Shelley
item.description:
"<b>Ozymandias</b>
I met a traveller from an antique land Who said: "Two vast and trunkless legs of stone Stand in the desert. Near them on the sand, Half sunk, a shattered visage lies, whose frown And wrinkled lip and sneer of cold command Tell that its sculptor well those passions read Which yet survive, stamped on these lifeless things, The hand that mocked them and the heart that fed. And on the pedestal these words appear: 'My name is Ozymandias, King of Kings: Look on my works, ye mighty, and despair!' Nothing beside remains. Round the decay Of that colossal wreck, boundless and bare, The lone and level sands stretch far away." -- Percy Bysshe Shelley

item.title: Zja add a quote by Percy Bysshe Shelley
item.description: "Death is the veil which those who live call life; They sleep, and it is lifted." -- Percy Bysshe Shelley

item.title: Zja add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Zja add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Zja add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Zja add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Zja add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Zja add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Zja add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams
